name: createResolution
description:
Creates an issue resolution.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).

name.description: The name of the resolution. Must be unique (case-insensitive).

$block: The ID of an issue resolution.

$ul: **id**: The ID of the issue resolution.
**errorMessages**: The list of error messages produced by this operation. For example, "input parameter 'key' must be provided"

**errors**: The list of errors by parameter returned by the operation. For example,"projectKey": "Project keys must start with an uppercase letter, followed by one or more uppercase alphanumeric characters."
